summary.span: 支持使用 对象的 或 访问器访问该对象的属性值。

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Column As Integer
public: property int Column { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含单元格或项的列的序号。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the column that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 一个从零开始的序号，标识了包含该单元格或项的列。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the column containing the cell or item.
The default value is 0.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，侦听器声明以跟踪网格容器内的网格项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 项属性被回显到控制台每次焦点更改事件时。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#101)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#101](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#101)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#1015)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#1015](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#1015)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#102)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#102](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#102)] [!code-csharp[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/CSharp/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.cs#103)] [!code-vb[UIAGridItemPattern_snip#103](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAGridItemPattern_snip/VisualBasic/UIAGridItemPattern_snippets.vb#103)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ColumnSpan As Integer
public: property int ColumnSpan { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取单元格或项跨的列数。

span.span: Gets the number of columns spanned by a cell or item.
The number of columns spanned.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，侦听器声明以跟踪网格容器内的网格项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 项属性被回显到控制台每次焦点更改事件时。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property ContainingGrid As AutomationElement

summary.span: 获取一个 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素，它支持 并表示单元格或项的容器。

span.span: Gets a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports and represents the container of the cell or item.

value.span: 一个 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素，它支持 GridPattern 并表示表单元格或项容器。

span.span: A [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element that supports the GridPattern and represents the table cell or item container.

value.span: 默认值为 null 引用 (在 Microsoft Visual Basic.NET)。

span.span: The default is a null reference ( in Microsoft Visual Basic .NET).

remarks.format: ## Examples 在以下示例中，侦听器声明以跟踪网格容器内的网格项的遍历。In the following example, an listener is declared to track the traversal of grid items within a grid container. 项属性被回显到控制台每次焦点更改事件时。Item properties are echoed to the console upon each focus-changed event. public: property int Row { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取包含单元格或项的行的序号。

span.span: Gets the ordinal number of the row that contains the cell or item.

value.span: 一个从零开始的序号，标识包含表单元格或项的行。

span.span: A zero-based ordinal number that identifies the row containing the table cell or item.
The default value is 0.

summary.span: 获取某个单元格或项跨的行数。

span.span: Gets the number of rows spanned by a cell or item.
The number of rows spanned.
The default value is 1.
